title: Senjou no Valkyria: wish your smile
original_name: 戦場のヴァルキュリア-wish your smile-
sinopse: This manga spin-off of the RPG Valkyria Chronicles is aimed at a female audience. The story is centered around two original characters--Mintz, an orphaned Darcsen engineer, and Julius Klose, an aloof, talented sniper.
